# Model 1

Brms:

```{r, eval = F, echo = T}
formula = cooling ~ 1 + Dens_L_s + DBH_med_L_s + SR_L_s +  Dens_S_s + DBH_med_S_s + (1 | tod) + (1 | Park),

family = gaussian(),

prior = c( 
          prior(normal(0, 0.5), class = "b"),
          prior(normal(0, 0.5), class = "Intercept"),
          prior(normal(0, 0.2), class = "sd"),
          prior(exponential(1), class = "sigma")
        )
```

Math stats:

$$
(\overline{\Delta T _{control}} - \overline{\Delta T _{park}}) - \overline{(\Delta T _{control} - \Delta T _{park})} = \beta_0 + \beta _{densL} *densityL + \beta _{sizeL} *sizeL + \beta _{richnessL} *richnessL + \beta _{densS} *densityS + \beta _{sizeS} *sizeS
$$
